instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923 super slow.
threads.message:
Good morning, customer dropped coffee and continue using, took the authorized, damaged U5850 and its trails. I made all the tracks and replace the component, but it's still slow. In the ASD test it says that the defect is in SMC.
    When you turn on the machine the cooler already turns on and after a while it starts to accelerate, you get

threads.title: 820-00923 super slow.
threads.message:
Run HWMonitor and post strange values you find.

NO ASD available since 2015...

threads.title: 820-00923 super slow.
threads.message: U5850 this component it is a right temperature sensor ?

threads.title: 820-00923 super slow.
threads.message:
There looks like Airport Proximity thermal sensor issue.
But this could be normal value, not always considered by SMC.

Inspect U5850 area and surrounding components.
Check the other things on page 56 too.

threads.title: 820-00923 super slow.
threads.message: Sorted out.  The u5850 was not touching the tracks.
